typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_Master as string,
		Fund_master_Name as string,
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_Country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_Master as string,
		Fund_master_Name as string,
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_Country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Fund_Name,
		Fund_Master,
		Fund_master_Name,
		Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_Country
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
